channel.title: Having a problem
channel.description:
Hello, im back from 1 year Runescape brake and now I'm trying to set up SCAR and scripts again.
I downloaded updated version of Stupidooo's Guildminer (I used earlier versions some time ago), v4.0. But it doesn't work right, I starts running the script, and I can enter my username and pass and set up options, but when I press start nothing happens - runescape frozes for 2-3secs and mouse holds still, no error messages or anything. And I have SCAR 2.03 that is required for the script, V-bright, low detail, 32bit, silent mouse off.
So... Where is the problem? Is it in script or is it my computer?
Thanks for help.

item.title: Having a problem
item.dc:creator: @mikkomainer Secet
item.description:
@mikkomainer wrote:

Thank you…

Read full topic

item.title: Having a problem
item.dc:creator: @Cheesehunk Cheesehunk
item.description:
@Cheesehunk wrote:

Scar Resource Library. It is a combination of the best includes, plus more! However the site that made it went down, but all there members are moving here, and the developers are staying here for a temorary developing home. Search SRL on these forums for more results.

Read full topic

item.title: Having a problem
item.dc:creator: @mikkomainer Secet
item.description:
@mikkomainer wrote:

Oh well good to hear that problem is not in me, but could you explain me what SRL is?

Read full topic

item.title: Having a problem
item.dc:creator: @Sub_Zero Sumilion
item.description:
@Sub_Zero wrote:

Well… i got some good news and some bad…
The good news is that your computer is not broken, at least not with this, the bad is that Stupid3ooo left and that the guildminer is broken.

Another good thingie, WT-Fakawi almost completely redid the guildminer, only i don’t know if i’m allowed to post it… Since it was for srl members only…

Read full topic
